page.title: AT&T BGW320-505 ONT Residential Voice Gateway

revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|brand = AT&T |model = BGW320 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -505 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 25 May 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/AT%26T_BGW-320-505_ONT_Residential_Voice_Gateway |wlclass = AX60003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = fiber gateway, wireless router, ONT |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ADZRBGW321 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM68580; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM4G1FETE-B041; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63EFR-TEC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 5GbE |lan2_ports = 3 |lan2_speed = 1GbE |totlan = 4 |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F8:9B:6E |oui = F8:9B:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SFP+ |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = DIN (2-pin)
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6E, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, HE80, GPON, SFP+, 5GBase-T (5GbE) |addchip = 2.4GHz High-Power 802.11ax WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;;4;,,, 5GHz High-Power WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;;8;,,, Low Input Voltage, Single-Supply High-Current LDO;Micrel;MIC61300;;1;,,, 200V N-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes;ZXMN20B28K;;2;,,, 8-bit Shift Register w/ Tri-state Output Registers;TI;SN74AHC595;;1;,,, Dual Subscriber Line Interface Circuit;Microsemi;Le9652PQC;;1;,,, Single Port <!--Negative Voltage-->Tracking SLIC Protector;Littelfuse;B61089BDR;;2;,,, 1.5A, Low Voltage μCap LDO Regulator;Microchip;MIC37153;;1;,,, 30V, 12A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4407A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = ATTDtXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^ATTDt[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Nokia |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/23/2022 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AT&T BGW-320 WLAN Module |rad1modif = PCIe (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6715; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = AT&T BGW-320 WLAN Module |rad2modif = PCIe (non-standard connector) |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6715; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi3_if_name = |rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6715; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam3 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad3ax = 2402 |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM68650 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Flash: 4GB eMMC ([[Samsung]]) *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x 5GbE, 3x GbE LAN, :1x GbE WAN ports, 1x SFP+ cage *Wi-Fi: 3x [[Broadcom]] BCM6715 (WiSoC) :802.11abgn/ac/ax, 1x 2.4GHz, 2x 5GHz :4x4:4 2.4/5GHz both High and Low band *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 12V/4A
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:AT&T BGW-320-505 Main Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:AT&T BGW-320-505 Main Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:AT&T BGW-320-505 Aux Top.jpeg|Auxillary Board Top File:AT&T BGW-320-505 Aux Bottom.jpeg|Auxillary Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
